1192180.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #6 (5E)
1192180.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #6


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out
Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Five adventures included!
Pillars of the Planes
A devilishly diabolical adventure for four to six characters of 2nd-3rd level by
Jonathan G. Nelson
Beldam of Stygian Glade
A witching adventure for four to six characters of 4th-6th level by
Jonathan G. Nelson
Umbravania: Queen of Nevermore
A horrendously horrifying adventure for three to four characters of 8th-10th level by
Justin Andrew Mason
To Wield an Iron Fist
An industrious adventure for three to four characters of 8th level by
Justin Andrew Mason
Dead of the Night Garden
A death-by-nature adventure for four to five characters of 14th-15th level by
Stephen Yeardley
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Theodore Story, and Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
